channel.title: Need help with smf forums
channel.description: I need to know how to add the following: Rep Display,Like on mopar And the rep++ link,like on mopar ---------------------------------- How do I mute,warn,moderate Players and get the Circle Icon to appear by their name? ------------ All help appreciated greatly, Rs w00dcut
